content: Generate a list of 10 words that end with 'tion'.

Sure! Here are ten words that end with "tion":

1. Information
2. Education
3. Celebration
4. Application
5. Communication
6. Imagination
7. Transportation
8. Organization
9. Exploration
10. Contribution

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
